segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The path and the bushes are so neat and tidy, unlike this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the sunlight is coming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a contrast to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The fence in the background looks sturdy and well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the inside of the house was as calm as the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plants outside look so healthy and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a shame the kitchen isn’t as lovely as the yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in such nice light, but no one is enjoying it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’d rather be outside than in this messy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
